name: Duck Tiles (itch) (Milo Games)
description:
Earn your name little ducko!

Duck Tiles is a strategic, puzzle game where you choose which row or column of tiles to send your ducko.

Tiles contain danger, hearts or shield.

  • Danger tiles remove HP and increase honour. Danger tiles level up over time.
  • Hearts give you HP. They degrade over time so grab them while you can.
  • Shields while instantly kill a danger tile without any loss of HP. Shields are always used first.
  • Honour earns bonus abilities such as extra shields, super downgrades and ducko bombs.
